SELECT A.HERO_FRAG_ID, A.USER_ID, A.USER_HERO_FRAG_NUM, A.`STATUS`, A.CREATE_TIME, C.HERO_NAME, D.USER_NAME FROM GM_USER_HERO_FRAG A LEFT JOIN GM_HERO_FRAG B ON A.HERO_FRAG_ID = B.HERO_FRAG_ID LEFT JOIN GM_HERO_INFO C ON B.HERO_INFO_ID = C.HERO_ID LEFT JOIN GM_USER D ON A.USER_ID = D.USER_ID
${ew.customSqlSegment} GROUP BY A.HERO_FRAG_ID , A.USER_ID , A.USER_HERO_FRAG_NUM , A.`STATUS` , A.CREATE_TIME , C.HERO_NAME , D.USER_NAME ORDER BY A.CREATE_TIME DESC , A.USER_HERO_FRAG_NUM DESC
